abstract: MF Global bet that that Europe would not let countries like Italy and Spain default. The New York Times's Floyd Norris reports that the irony of the company's failure is that its bets will, in the long run, probably turn out to have been good ones

headline.main: MF Global: Good Bets, Bad Timing?
